snippet.title: Super Mario Nightfall - NFGD Trailer
snippet.description:
Super Mario Nightfall is a mod of New Super Mario Bros. Wii that includes the following:
- 30+ New levels with night-to-daytime theming throughout them!
- Tons of custom tilesets!
- A new soundtrack!
- Custom backgrounds!
- Enemy retextures!
And more!

— DESCRIPTION —

2nd trailer, WHAT?! yea, as you can probably tell, A LOT has changed since the first one. Many stages were either completely remade or polished heavily in favor of a more unique experience! Very special thanks for the NFGD Staff for including my trailer in the 2023 Nintendo Fan-Game Direct! https://youtu.be/LQR9NG65ONw?si=Ig_6MmUpPgF5YTdn

Trailer Music: Sky at Sunset - Kirby Triple Deluxe

— CREDITS —

• Logo made by Miguel

• Gameplay recorded by Microtransagolor
